name: Phase Viscosity Mass Model
description: Integrate the Phase Viscosity concept into the mass formula and re-validate accuracy.

hypothesis.H0: A model based on phase resistance does not explain the origin of mass or maintain mass prediction accuracy.
hypothesis.H1: The Phase Viscosity model maintains R2 > 0.999 for fermion masses while providing a physical derivation for the log-mass law.

data_requirements.description: Fermion mass data and hyperbolic volumes V.

test_method: LOO-CV cross-validation and accuracy benchmarking against H11 results.
